scripts.build:sample: rimraf docs/ && cd sample && elm make src/Main.elm --output=../docs/index.html
scripts.test: npm run test:pub && npm run test:dev && npm run test:sample
scripts.test:dev: cd dev && elm-review && elm-test && elm-format --validate src && elm make --docs=/tmp/docs.json
scripts.test:sample: cd sample && elm-review && elm-format --validate src && elm make src/Main.elm --output=/tmp/index.html
